item.title: Making a pk area when you die not lose items
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

So i’m trying to make my pkbox that when you die you don’t lose items just re spawn at normal spot when you die and everything is in inventory. I’ve tried multiple ways to no avail could anyone give me a helpful nudge?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2009, 07:39:05 pm[/size][hr]Alright so i tried putting this under applyDead void

if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true && (absX >= 3309 && absX <= 3325  && absY >= 9393 && absY <= 9361)) {
                        teleportToX = 2853;
                        teleportToY = 3591;
                        IsDeadTeleporting = true;
                        frame1();
                        updateRequired = true;
                        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                        NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                        setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
                        playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                        refreshSkills();
                        PoisonDelay = 9999999;
                        KillerId = playerId;
}

still didn’t work any ideas?

Read full topic
